```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
df_1 <- read_delim("data/file 1/File_1_Authors_Adresses_2010.txt", 
    "|", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
```

```{r}
glimpse(df_1)
```

```{r}
bordas <- df_1 %>% 
  filter(str_detect(AuthorName,'Bordas, Stephane'))
```
